chunks.text:
I hope you’re doing well. 

 

My name is Rubem Lima, and I’m responsible for coordinating this process. I’m here to assist you with any needs you may have.

 

Consignee: PATRICK CHALHOUB

 

Flight details are below:



 

Please note attached documentation of the final pre-alert for boarding.

 

Please note that we have a scheduled boarding date of 08/12/2025.

 

Could you please give us the ok so we can continue with the shipment, if you need any further documentation please let us know.

 

INSURANCE NOTE:  

 

Please inform us and also the terminal if the crates have any damage before the truck leaves the warehouse so we can request authorization to move forward. Due to the insurance hired in Brazil, we must present any damage report immediately to the insurer. A video call may be requested by the insurer to assess the condition of the crates and pieces. Please inform the truck driver. 

 

(If it is not possible to follow the entire procedure mentioned above, prioritize having the driver load the cargo but ensure that a damage report is made with the terminal/airline.)

 

Insurance Contact: 

 

We will send the draft documents for your approval shortly.

 

Please let us know if you have any questions or requests.

 

Atenciosamente / Best Regards / Saludos cordiales

 



		Rubem  Lima

Operational Department

 +55 (11) 2872-0103 – Ramal    404

+55 (11) 99681-6606

sysgroup.com.br <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Of4-CyJKgfExwX8TZfQsxdQDI?domain=urldefense.com> 

 



Freight Forwarder - Trade Company

Please see below details:

 

- UAE Freight forwarder AWB details

  MAWB consignee

  AAS Shipping LLC 

  Office No. 201 Hamza A Building

  Khalid A; Waleed Road

  Dubai,  UAE

 

- Confirm if they accept MAWB/HAWB or only direct AWB

 Please arrange MAWB + HAWB 

 

- Address to ship the original docs that they will need for clearance before shipment (UAE requires original docs for clearing)

  for Personal Shipment , original is not required just to make sure that  HS code and CO are mentioned in the shipping documents.

 

- If anything shall be filled as NOTIFY

 not required  

 

 

 

Thank you 

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Nancy Mendoza

Assunto: ETEL - DUBAI PD 26349 I SY251118

 

Dear Etoile and Chalhoub team,

 

Hope all of you are well.

 

I’m Ingra from SysGroup, the freight forwarder responsible for shipping your beautiful ETEL furniture to Dubai airport.

 

As this shipment is only up to DXB airport, we need you to confirm below information so we can start the process accordingly:

 

- UAE Freight forwarder AWB details

- Confirm if they accept MAWB/HAWB or only direct AWB

- Address to ship the original docs that they will need for clearance before shipment (UAE requires original docs for clearing)

- If anything shall be filled as NOTIFY

Atenciosamente / Kind Regards / Saludos Cordiales,



		Ingra Andrioli

Hi @Bineesh Balakrishnan <mailto:bineesh.balakrishnan@aas-shipping.com> 

Noted on the Gatepass, - kindly arrange delivery tomm and keep all posted 

 

Hi @Linton Crockford-Moore <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> 

Please find the attached documents related to the subject shipment, which has arrived & cleared. 

 

Upon receipt of the container, as per our standard procedure, we kindly request the following:

*	Pictures of the cargo prior to offloading
*	Pictures of the items after offloading
*	Proof of Delivery document

 

Hi @Jagath Pillai <mailto:jagath@emoversuae.com>  / @Sanil Chandra <mailto:sanil@emoversuae.com>

chunks.text:
*	Pictures of the cargo prior to offloading
*	Pictures of the items after offloading
*	Proof of Delivery document

 

Hi @Jagath Pillai <mailto:jagath@emoversuae.com>  / @Sanil Chandra <mailto:sanil@emoversuae.com> 

We request your usual support with the offloading of the shipment. Kindly ensure that the required manpower and resources are in place for both offloading and assembling the items.
Please apply for the gatepass and confirm once it has been obtained.

 

To All Concerned,
Please be reminded to account for mid-day break timings when planning the shipment handling, to avoid any penalties from the authorities.

Thank you all for your coordination and support.

 

Hi @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

Please assist to insure the cargo once delivered to Villa covering offloading / assembling & storage if any.

 

Regards

 

 

GEETA MANJAL
